addi $1,  $0, 10         # Initialize registers with base values
addi $2,  $0, 20
addi $13, $0, 50
addi $8,  $0, 100

add  $3,  $1,  $2        # Chain 1: Arithmetic operations
sub  $5,  $3,  $1
andi $6,  $5,  31        # 0x1F = 31
sll  $7,  $6,  3
sub  $9,  $8,  $7
srl  $10, $9,  2
ori  $11, $10, 1         # 0x1 = 1
nor  $12, $11, $7

add  $14, $13, $13       # Chain 2: Independent parallel chain
sub  $15, $14, $12
andi $16, $15, 255       # 0xFF = 255
sll  $17, $16, 1
srl  $18, $17, 2
nor  $19, $18, $16
add  $20, $19, $14

addi $4,  $0,  5         # Interleaved independent immediate
addi $21, $0,  85        # 0x55 = 85
andi $22, $20, 43690     # 0xAAAA = 43690
ori  $23, $22, 21845     # 0x5555 = 21845
nor  $24, $23, $21

sll  $25, $24, 4         # Final shift chain
srl  $26, $25, 1
srl  $27, $26, 1
nor  $28, $27, $25
add  $29, $28, $20
sub  $30, $29, $28

addi $31, $0, 7          # Initialize $31 with 7
sll  $31, $31, 2         # Shift left logical by 2
add  $31, $31, $30       # Add $30 to $31
nor  $31, $31, $29       # NOR $31 with $29




0 : 00100000000000010000000000001010;
1 : 00100000000000100000000000010100;
2 : 00100000000011010000000000110010;
3 : 00100000000010000000000001100100;
4 : 00000000001000100001100000100000;
5 : 00000000011000010010100000100010;
6 : 00110000101001100000000000011111;
7 : 00000000110000000011100011000000;
8 : 00000001000001110100100000100010;
9 : 00000001001000000101000010000010;
10 : 00110101010010110000000000000001;
11 : 00000001011001110110000000100111;
12 : 00000001101011010111000000100000;
13 : 00000001110011000111100000100010;
14 : 00110001111100000000000011111111;
15 : 00000010000000001000100001000000;
16 : 00000010001000001001000010000010;
17 : 00000010010100001001100000100111;
18 : 00000010011011101010000000100000;
19 : 00100000000001000000000000000101;
20 : 00100000000101010000000001010101;
21 : 00110010100101101010101010101010;
22 : 00110110110101110101010101010101;
23 : 00000010111101011100000000100111;
24 : 00000011000000001100100100000000;
25 : 00000011001000001101000001000010;
26 : 00000011010000001101100001000010;
27 : 00000011011110011110000000100111;
28 : 00000011100101001110100000100000;
29 : 00000011101111001111000000100010;
30 : 00100000000111110000000000000111;
31 : 00000011111000001111100010000000;
32 : 00000011111111101111100000100000;
33 : 00000011111111011111100000100111;



fuck this ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

better version below: 



addi $1,  $0, 10        
addi $2,  $0, 20
addi $13, $0, 5
addi $8,  $0, 30
add  $3,  $1,  $2       
sub  $5,  $3,  $1
andi $6,  $5,  15        
sll  $7,  $6,  2
sub  $9,  $8,  $7
addi $10, $9,  2         
ori  $11, $10, 1         
nor  $12, $11, $7
add  $14, $13, $13      
sub  $15, $14, $12
andi $16, $15, 15        
sll  $17, $16, 1
addi $18, $17, 1        
nor  $19, $18, $16
add  $20, $19, $14
addi $4,  $0,  5        
addi $21, $0,  10        
andi $22, $20, 10        
ori  $23, $22, 5         
nor  $24, $23, $21
sll  $25, $24, 2         
addi $26, $25, 1         
addi $27, $26, 1         
nor  $28, $27, $25
add  $29, $28, $20
sub  $30, $29, $28
addi $31, $0, 7          
sll  $31, $31, 1         
add  $31, $31, $30       
nor  $31, $31, $29


bin:

1 : 00100000000000100000000000010100;
2 : 00100000000011010000000000000101;

5 : 00000000011000010010100000100010;
6 : 00110000101001100000000000001111;
7 : 00000000110000000011100010000000;

+
addi $10, $9,  2
SLL $0, $0, 0
ori  $11, $10, 1
SLL $0, $0, 0
nor  $12, $11, $7
SLL $0, $0, 0
sub  $15, $14, $12
SLL $0, $0, 0
andi $16, $15, 15
SLL $0, $0, 0
sll  $17, $16, 1
SLL $0, $0, 0
addi $18, $17, 1
SLL $0, $0, 0
nor  $19, $18, $16
SLL $0, $0, 0
add  $20, $19, $14
SLL $0, $0, 0
andi $22, $20, 10
SLL $0, $0, 0
ori  $23, $22, 5
SLL $0, $0, 0
nor  $24, $23, $21
SLL $0, $0, 0
sll  $25, $24, 2
SLL $0, $0, 0
addi $26, $25, 1
SLL $0, $0, 0
addi $27, $26, 1
SLL $0, $0, 0
nor  $28, $27, $25
SLL $0, $0, 0
add  $29, $28, $20
SLL $0, $0, 0
sub  $30, $29, $28
SLL $0, $0, 0
add  $31, $31, $30
SLL $0, $0, 0
nor  $31, $31, $29
SLL $0, $0, 0


















Sum of numbers scheduled


ORI $2, $0, 0x1
ORI $3, $0, 0x0
ORI $4, $0, 0xA
SLL $0, $0, 0
SUM_LOOP: ADD $3, $3, $2
ADDI $2, $2, 1
SLT $5, $4, $2
SLL $0, $0, 0
SLL $0, $0, 0
BEQ $5, $0, SUM_LOOP
SW $3, 0x0($0)
SLL $0, $0, 0
END: SLL $0, $0, 0
SLL $0, $0, 0
final values
R 2: 11
R 3: 55
R 4: 10
R 5: 1

6 : 00000000100000100010100000101010;
